discussion.content: Correct answer is C because option A leads to "File not found" on the phone.

Answer is A, because DHCP option 150 is the TFTP address where the phone tries to get the configuration file.
Wrong address leads to TFTP error.
C. The TFTP address for the phone is not in the CTL file.

Correct Answer here is C
TFTP Authorization Fails
Problem
Phone reports TFTP authorization failure.

Cause
The TFTP address for the phone does not exist in the CTL file.

If you created a new CTL file with a new TFTP record, the existing CTL file on the phone may not contain a record for the new TFTP server.

Solution
Check the configuration of the TFTP address in the phone CTL file.
https://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/voice_ip_comm/cuipph/9971_9951_8961/9_0/english/admin_guide/P567_BK_CEC6105C_00_admin-guide-8961-9951-9971_chapter_01100.html#P567_RF_TEE1EAE1_00

choices.B: The phone has a cabling issue.
choices.C: The TFTP address for the phone is not in the CTL file.
choices.D: A firewall in the network is blocking access.
choices.A: DHCP option 150 has the incorrect TFTP address configured.
